properties.areaDesc: Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Northern Middlesex
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 11:29PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
A quick moving area of low pressure will bring a wintry mix of
rain, sleet, and patchy freezing rain to the region between
midnight and 2am, before a changeover to plain rain. Because
temperatures have radiated into the upper 20s to 30 degrees for
many spots this evening, patchy black ice on untreated surfaces is
possible as well for at least the first half of the overnight.

If traveling overnight, proceed with extra caution as untreated
surfaces may be slippery. Temperatures should rise safely above
freezing late tonight, alleviating the icing threat.
